full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP).

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is designed to provide prestigious ISC2 certification in cloud security. It is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, an official academy in Israel.

COURSE SCHEDULE: The course starts on 17.02.2025. Classes are held on Mondays from 17:30 to 21:30 and on Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00. The course spans 9 sessions, totaling 45 academic hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: The course is hybrid, with classes conducted both on the Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, according to your preference.

PREREQUISITES: Participants are required to have 5 years of experience in information technology and must have a consultation with an academic advisor.

COURSE TOPICS: The course covers the following topics:
- Cloud Concepts, Architecture and Design.
- Cloud Data Security.
- Cloud Platform and Infrastructure Security.
- Cloud Application Security.
- Cloud Security Operations.
- Legal, Risk, and Compliance.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: To schedule an admission interview and registration, contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or via email at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University, a leading institution in Israel, offers this course through its School of High-Tech and Cyber, which is recognized as an official ISC2 academy.
